definitions.definition: Used as a command to bring soldiers to the attention position .
A call for people to be quiet/stop doing what they are presently doing and pay heed to what they are to be told or shown.

main_definition: ( military ) Used as a command to bring soldiers to the attention position .
secondary_definitions: A call for people to be quiet/stop doing what they are presently doing and pay heed to what they are to be told or shown.
